channel.title: Perfect Ring Help
channel.description: How can i make it so that i (owner of server) can spawn a perfect ring. i don't want any other people who can spawn to spawn a perfect ring.

item.title: Perfect Ring Help
item.dc:creator: @Bl3nd Bl3nd
item.description:
@Bl3nd wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:3, topic:536034”][quote author=Bl3nd link=topic=654837.msg4385570#msg4385570 date=1385358965]
Or you can just add a whole separate command that only gives you that item, if what sk8r said doesn’t work.

If you’d want a whole new command do:

if (command.startsWith("pring") && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Your name")) { player.getInventory().addItem(##, 1); }

So for the ##, add the id of the p ring, as I do not know the id.
Then just change “Your name” to your account name. (pretty obvious or it wouldn’t work).
[/quote]
Yes, but people can spawn, that’s why he doesn’t want others to be able to access it, so what you said wouldn’t change anything.

Also, OP, you can make a check in the equip item packet for the ID of the ring, and if it’s not you it can auto-delete the ring.[/quote]

Oh! Ha I guess I didn’t really think through it. Yea mine wouldn’t work haha

Read full topic

item.title: Perfect Ring Help
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“Bl3nd, post:1, topic:536044”]Or you can just add a whole separate command that only gives you that item, if what sk8r said doesn’t work.

If you’d want a whole new command do:

if (command.startsWith("pring") && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Your name")) { player.getInventory().addItem(##, 1); }

So for the ##, add the id of the p ring, as I do not know the id.
Then just change “Your name” to your account name. (pretty obvious or it wouldn’t work).[/quote]
Yes, but people can spawn, that’s why he doesn’t want others to be able to access it, so what you said wouldn’t change anything.

Also, OP, you can make a check in the equip item packet for the ID of the ring, and if it’s not you it can auto-delete the ring.

Read full topic

item.title: Perfect Ring Help
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

yur dad 1234:

How can i make it so that i (owner of server) can spawn a perfect ring. i don’t want any other people who can spawn to spawn a perfect ring.

In the ::item command just add a check in to see if they’re trying to spawn a p ring and check if their name either equals yours or equals owner rights.

Example:

if(itemID == 1234 && !playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Owner")){ sendMessage("Sorry but you're not allowed to spawn this item."); return; }

Read full topic
